short_summary: North Portal Traveler Building Flooring Replacement
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement
### Contract Title: Flooring Replacement - North Portal Traveler Building
### Solicitation Number: WS4075682474

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) on behalf of the Canada Border Services Agency (CBSA) invites contractors to submit a tender for the replacement of the flooring in the North Portal Traveler Building located at the Saskatchewan Port of Entry.

### Key Project Details:

* Scope of work: Replace approximately 428 m² of flooring with new carpet, porcelain floor tile, sheet flooring, and rubber base in a portion of the North Portal Traveler Building.
* Project location: HWY 39, North Portal, SK, S0C 1W0
* Project duration: Estimated two-date period from start to finish (start and end dates if available please)
* Phasing requirements: The border crossing operates 24 hours per day, seven days per week, requiring phasing and temporary furniture relocation to maintain full operations with minimal disruptions during flooring replacement.

### Tendering Method:

This is a competitive tendering process, open to all qualified contractors. The tender closing date is November 28, 2023 at 2:00 PM EST. Late bids will not be accepted.

### Procurement Details:
* Procurement category: CNST
* Trade agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Regions of delivery: Saskatchewan

### Contact Information:

For any questions or concerns regarding this tender, please contact Matthew Virakorn, Procurement Specialist at the PSPC:

 Telephone: Not available

 Email: [matthew.virakorn@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:matthew.virakorn@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

A tender package, including a complete set of drawings, specifications, and any other necessary documents can be found on the Ariba Discovery platform: [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17800120?extsite=MTc4MDAxMjBfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17800120?extsite=MTc4MDAxMjBfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

A site visit will be held on November 3, 2023, at 11:00 AM CST at the CBSA Port of Entry located on HWY 39, North Portal
